Credit Line: The Cesnola Collection, Purchased by subscription, 1874–76
Description: Colorless with greenish tinge.Rounded, everted rim; very narrow indented neck; uneven sides expanding downwards with slight projecting ridge at base, then turned to bottom with pointed kick at center.Intact; pinprick bubbles; pitting and brilliant iridescent weathering; some soil encrustation and limy weathering on interior.
